prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The tool is recommended for complex AI-generated content creation, separating code from prompts, and orchestrating multiple prompts. It's not ideal for simple, single-prompt applications or when OpenAI Assistants (GPTs) suffice.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: When to Use ChatGPT Prompt Chains
